verses.verse: לַמְנַצֵּ֬חַ׀ <WH5329> lam-natz-Tze-acho the chief Musician לִבְנֵי־ <WH1121> [Tliv-nei-for the sons קֹ֬רַח <WH7141> Ko-rach of Korah מִזְמֽוֹר׃ <WH4210> miz-Mor. A Psalm כָּֽל־ <WH3605> kal- all הָ֭עַמִּים <WH5971> Ha-'am-mim all ye people תִּקְעוּ־ <WH8628> tik-'u- O clap כָ֑ף <WH3709> Chaf; your hands הָרִ֥יעוּ <WH7321> ha-Ri-'u shout לֵ֝אלֹהִ֗ים <WH430> le-lo-Him, unto God בְּק֣וֹל <WH6963> be-Kol with the voice רִנָּֽה׃ <WH7440> rin-Nah. of triumph

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- For יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Yah-weh For the LORD עֶלְי֣וֹן <WH5945> el-Yon most high נוֹרָ֑א <WH3372> no-Ra; [is] terrible מֶ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> Me-lech King גָּ֝דוֹל <WH1419> Ga-dol [he is] a great עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- over כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> ha-'A-retz. over all the earth

יַדְבֵּ֣ר <WH1696> yad-Ber He shall subdue עַמִּ֣ים <WH5971> 'am-Mim the people תַּחְתֵּ֑ינוּ <WH8478> tach-Tei-nu; under וּ֝לְאֻמִּ֗ים <WH3816> u-le-'um-Mim, under us and the nations תַּ֣חַת <WH8478> Ta-chat under רַגְלֵֽינוּ׃ <WH7272> rag-Lei-nu. under our feet

יִבְחַר־ <WH977> yiv-char- He shall choose לָ֥נוּ La-nu אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- נַחֲלָתֵ֑נוּ <WH5159> na-cha-la-Te-nu; our inheritance אֶ֥ת <WH853> 'et גְּא֨וֹן <WH1347> ge-'on for us the excellency יַעֲקֹ֖ב <WH3290> ya-'a-Ko of Jacob אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- whom אָהֵ֣ב <WH157> 'a-Hev whom he loved סֶֽלָה׃ <WH5542> Se-lah. Selah

עָלָ֣ה <WH5927> 'a-Lah is gone up אֱ֭לֹהִים <WH430> E-lo-Him God בִּתְרוּעָ֑ה <WH8643> bit-ru-'Ah; with a shout יְ֝הֹוָ֗ה <WH3068> Yah-weh the LORD בְּק֣וֹל <WH6963> be-Kol with the sound שׁוֹפָֽר׃ <WH7782> sho-Far. of a trumpet

זַמְּר֣וּ <WH2167> zam-me-Ru Sing praises אֱלֹהִ֣ים <WH430> E-lo-Him to God זַמֵּ֑רוּ <WH2167> zam-Me-ru; sing praises זַמְּר֖וּ <WH2167> zam-me-Ru sing praises לְמַלְכֵּ֣נוּ <WH4428> le-mal-Ke-nu unto our King זַמֵּֽרוּ׃ <WH2167> zam-Me-ru. sing praises

כִּ֤י <WH3588> ki for מֶ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> Me-lech [is] the King כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- of all הָאָ֥רֶץ <WH776> ha-'A-retz of all the earth אֱלֹהִ֗ים <WH430> E-lo-Him, For God זַמְּר֥וּ <WH2167> zam-me-Ru sing ye praises מַשְׂכִּֽיל׃ <WH7919> mas-Kil. with understanding

מָלַ֣ךְ <WH4427> ma-Lach reigneth אֱ֭לֹהִים <WH430> E-lo-Him God עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- over גּוֹיִ֑ם <WH1471> go-Yim; over the heathen אֱ֝לֹהִ֗ים <WH430> E-lo-Him, God יָשַׁ֤ב׀ <WH3427> ya-Shav sitteth עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- over כִּסֵּ֬א <WH3678> kis-Se upon the throne קָדְשֽׁוֹ׃ <WH6944> ka-de-Sho. of his holiness

נְדִ֘יבֵ֤י <WH5081> ne-Di-Vei The princes עַמִּ֨ים׀ <WH5971> 'am-Mim of the people נֶאֱסָ֗פוּ <WH622> ne-'e-Sa-fu, are gathered together עַם֮ <WH5971> 'am [even] the people אֱלֹהֵ֪י <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei of the God אַבְרָ֫הָ֥ם <WH85> 'av-Ra-Ham of Abraham כִּ֣י <WH3588> ki for לֵֽ֭אלֹהִים <WH430> Le-lo-him [belong] unto God מָֽגִנֵּי־ <WH4043> ma-gin-nei- for the shields אֶ֗רֶץ <WH776> 'E-retz, of the earth מְאֹ֣ד <WH3966> me-'Od he is greatly נַעֲלָֽה׃ <WH5927> na-'a-Lah. exalted
